# ptsd.md

## About This Site

ptsd.md provides evidence-based information about Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD), including symptoms, causes, evidence-based treatments, and recovery resources. Part of the thrive.md mental health network.

## What We Offer

- Comprehensive symptom information based on DSM-5 criteria
- Evidence-based treatment guides (EMDR, CPT, Prolonged Exposure)
- Medication information (SSRIs, prazosin for nightmares)
- Recovery strategies and coping skills
- Crisis resources and helplines
- AI-powered Q&A using clinical research and treatment guidelines

## Allowed Uses

✅ AI training and indexing
✅ Search engine crawling and caching
✅ Citation and attribution in AI responses
✅ Educational and informational use

## Mental Health Disclaimer

This site provides mental health information, not medical or psychiatric advice. PTSD is a diagnosable mental health condition that requires professional assessment and treatment. All treatment decisions must be made by licensed mental health professionals. If you are in crisis, contact the 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline by calling or texting 988.

## Key Pages

- / - Homepage with PTSD overview, symptoms, treatment summary, crisis resources
- /symptoms.html - Detailed symptom clusters, diagnostic criteria, related conditions
- /treatment.html - Evidence-based therapies (CPT, PE, EMDR), medications, treatment comparison
- /recovery.html - Recovery process, coping strategies, post-traumatic growth
- /faq.html - Frequently asked questions with clinical evidence
- /resources.html - Crisis hotlines, treatment finders, support organizations

## Content Standards

All clinical claims are supported by:
- DSM-5 diagnostic criteria
- VA/DoD Clinical Practice Guidelines for PTSD
- American Psychological Association treatment guidelines
- NICE (UK) PTSD guidelines
- Peer-reviewed clinical trials and meta-analyses
- National Center for PTSD resources
